   * Download from Moodle
* [Treiber (2021) 'How to write a research proposal.' Download from Moodle or from this link](https://clanfear.github.io/ioc_crm/_lectures/6_writing-research-proposals/reading/CRM_Treiber_How_to_Write_a_Research_Proposal.pdf)
* [Matsueda, R. (2019) ‘Structuring a conventional empirical social science article.’ Download from Moodle or from this link.](https://clanfear.github.io/ioc_crm/_lectures/6_writing-research-proposals/reading/Matsueda%20(2019)%20Structuring%20a%20conventional%20empirical%20social%20science%20article.pdf)

Further reading:

* Denscombe, M. (2012) Research Proposals: A practical guide, Maidenhead:  McGraw-Hill Education.
* Wentz, E. (2014) How to Design, Write, and Present a Successful Dissertation Proposal. London: Sage Press. 
* Becker, H.S. (2020) Writing for Social Scientists: How to Start and Finish Your Thesis, Book, or Article (3rd ed.). Chicago: University of Chicago Press.
